module.sqlWrap: SELECT TOP (@Top) PassportId FROM BeSpeakVedio WHERE VedioId = @VedioId

SELECT TOP(@Top) bsv.VedioId,v.Title,v.Banner,bsv.CreatedTime,v.LiveTime,v.EndTime,c.Logo AS CircleLogo FROM BeSpeakVedio bsv INNER JOIN Vedio v ON v.VedioId = bsv.VedioId INNER JOIN Circle c ON c.CircleId = v.CircleId WHERE bsv.PassportId = @PassportId AND v.Status = 1 ORDER BY v.LiveTime DESC
SELECT COUNT(BeSpeakId) FROM BeSpeakVedio WHERE PassportId=@PassportId AND VedioId = @VedioId
DELETE FROM BeSpeakVedio WHERE VedioId = @VedioId AND PassportId = @PassportId
UPDATE BeSpeakVedio SET IsSend = 1 WHERE BeSpeakId = @BeSpeakId

SELECT bsv.BeSpeakId,v.VedioId,c.Logo,v.Title,v.LiveTime,u.PassportId,u.MobilePhone FROM BeSpeakVedio bsv INNER JOIN Vedio v ON v.VedioId = bsv.VedioId INNER JOIN UserPassport u ON u.PassportId = bsv.PassportId INNER JOIN Circle c ON v.CircleId = c.CircleId WHERE GETDATE() BETWEEN DATEADD(MI,-10,v.LiveTime) AND v.LiveTime AND bsv.IsSend = 0
